summary: Implements an Ansible module that performs HTTP/HTTPS operations, allowing users to send GET, POST, PUT, DELETE and other methods to a specified URL with configurable headers, authentication, payloads, timeouts, redirects, and SSL verification, and returns detailed response information including status code, headers, body, and optional file download.
business_intent: Enable automated workflows to interact with web services and APIs by making HTTP requests, retrieving or sending data, and handling responses within Ansible playbooks.
